Class TensorFlow

java.lang.Object
org.tensorflow.TensorFlow
public final class TensorFlow extends Object
Static utility methods describing the TensorFlow runtime.

  • Method Details

    • version

      public static String version()
      Returns the version of the underlying TensorFlow runtime.

    • registeredOpList

      public static OpList registeredOpList()
      All the TensorFlow operations available in this address space.
      Returns:
      A OpList protocol buffer, which lists all the available TensorFlow operations.

    • isOpStateful

      public static boolean isOpStateful(String opType)

    • loadLibrary

      public static OpList loadLibrary(String filename)
      Load the dynamic library in filename and register the operations and kernels present in that library.
      Parameters:
      filename - Path of the dynamic library containing operations and kernels to load.
      Returns:
      A OpList protocol buffer message defining the operations defined in the library.
      Throws:
      UnsatisfiedLinkError - if filename cannot be loaded.

    • registerFilesystemPlugin

      public static void registerFilesystemPlugin(String filename)
      Loads the filesystem plugin from filename and registers all the filesystems it supports.

      Throws a TF runtime exception if the plugin failed to load.

      Parameters:
      filename - Path of the dynamic library containing the filesystem support.

    • registerCustomGradient

      public static boolean registerCustomGradient(String opType, RawCustomGradient gradient)
      Register a custom gradient function for ops of opType type.

      Creates the gradient based off of a GraphOperation. To operate on the op input class instead use CustomGradient.

      Note that this only works with graph gradients, and will eventually be deprecated in favor of unified gradient support once it is fully supported by tensorflow core.

      Warning: Custom gradient registration is currently not supported on Windows, see GitHub issue for more info.

      Parameters:
      opType - the type of op to register the gradient for. Should usually be an OP_NAME field, i.e. Add.OP_NAME.
      gradient - the gradient function to use
      Returns:
      true if the gradient was registered, false if there was already a gradient registered for this op

    • registerCustomGradient

      public static <T extends RawOpInputs<?>> boolean registerCustomGradient(Class<T> inputClass, CustomGradient<T> gradient)
      Register a custom gradient function for ops of inputClass's op type. The actual op type is detected from the class's OpInputsMetadata annotation. As such, it only works on generated op classes or custom op classes with the correct annotations. To operate on the GraphOperation directly use RawCustomGradient.

      Warning: Custom gradient registration is currently not supported on Windows, see GitHub issue for more info.

      Parameters:
      inputClass - the inputs class of op to register the gradient for.
      gradient - the gradient function to use
      Returns:
      true if the gradient was registered, false if there was already a gradient registered for this op
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if inputClass is not annotated with OpInputsMetadata or the op class is not annotated with OpMetadata.
